channel.title: Plz help me
channel.description: i ahve 999m but i want good items phats,santa,dragon and soo on....but it say wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 0995 10 but i did do that to get money what do i put to get more items..????

item.title: Plz help me
item.dc:creator: @Diffusion Diffusion
item.description:
@Diffusion wrote:

go to your server folder and open the cfg folder, then open items.cfg in notepad.

Click edit, and select find.

Type in an obvious keyword ie chain, if you want the code for d chain and keep clicking find next until dragon chain is highlighted.

Then you look at its code number and you type:

::pickup code 1

This gives you 1 dragon chain

REMEMBER THE CODE MUST BE 4 DIGITS IE 4999, 0999, 0099,0009. K?

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help me
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Java The Real Java
item.description:
@The_Real_Java wrote:

you put like ::pickup 1042 1 for a blue phat
